data.chText: 记起；回忆起；回想起

before.enText: not used in the progressive tenses

data.enText: to remember sth

data.chText: 她想不起他的名字。
data.enText: She could not recall his name.

data.chText: 如果我没记错的话，他住在卢顿。
data.enText: If I recall correctly, he lives in Luton.

data.chText: 我想不起来以前曾经见过她。
data.enText: I can't recall meeting her before.

data.chText: 他回想起她星期三总是很晚回家。
data.enText: He recalled that she always came home late on Wednesdays.

data.chText: 你能记起到底发生了什么事吗？
data.enText: Can you recall exactly what happened?

data.chText: 使想起；使想到；勾起

before.enText: not used in the progressive tenses

data.enText: to make sb think of sth

data.chText: 这首诗令人想起艾略特的《荒原》。
data.enText: The poem recalls Eliot's ‘The Waste Land’.

data.chText: 召回
data.enText: to order sb to return

data.chText: 两个国家都召回了各自的大使。
data.enText: Both countries recalled their ambassadors.

data.chText: 他被召回执行军事任务。
data.enText: He was recalled to military duty.

data.chText: 他们俩都被重新召回了威尔士队。
data.enText: They have both been recalled to the Welsh squad (= selected as members of the team after a time when they were not selected) .

data.chText: 收回，召回（残损货品等）
data.enText: to ask for sth to be returned, often because there is sth wrong with it

data.chText: 公司回收了所有有问题的吹风机。
data.enText: The company has recalled all the faulty hairdryers.

data.chText: 记忆力；记性
data.enText: the ability to remember sth that you have learned or sth that has happened in the past

data.chText: 她有惊人的记忆力。
data.enText: She has amazing powers of recall.

data.chText: 有快速记忆的能力
data.enText: to have instant recall (= to be able to remember sth immediately)

data.chText: 记得所有细节
data.enText: to have total recall (= to be able to remember all the details of sth)

data.chText: 召回令；回归请求；回收令
data.enText: an official order or request for sb/sth to return, or for sth to be given back

data.chText: 让托马斯回归威尔士队的要求
data.enText: Thomas's recall to the Welsh team
beyond recall

data.chText: 不可恢复；想不起来；记不住
data.enText: impossible to bring back to the original state; impossible to remember

simple_means.memory_skill: re 回；向后 + call 想起 → 回忆

ex.chText: 他依然记得在乡下劳动的日子。
ex.enText: He still remembers the days when he worked in the country.

ex.chText: 我记得这本书已经还给你了。
ex.enText: I remember returning the book to you.

synonyms.bx: 普通用词，指记得（做过）某事时，通常后接名词、动名词、that 从句；指记得要做某事时，通常后接动词不定式。

ex.chText: 教授让他的学生背熟一首叶芝的短诗。
ex.enText: The professor had his students memorize a short poem of Yeats.
It is important to memorize these regulations.

synonyms.bx: 指将所有细节都牢牢记住或背熟。

ex.chText: 你能记起谁给你的那份文件吗？
ex.enText: Can you recall who gave that document to you?

ex.chText: 她想不起来曾经和他一起吃过饭。
ex.enText: She didn't recall having dined with him.

synonyms.bx: 指设法想起发生在过去的事情。

ex.chText: 她伤心地回忆起，她以前常和他去那个餐厅吃晚饭。
ex.enText: She recollected sadly that she used to have dinner with him in that restaurant.

ex.chText: 据他回忆，聚会开始时那个高个男子不在场。
ex.enText: As far as he can recollect, that tall man was not there when the party began.

synonyms.bx: 较正式用词，指力图想起有些许印象的事。

data.enText: beyond recall

data.chText: 不可恢复；想不起来；记不住
data.enText: impossible to bring back to the original state; impossible to remember

tr: the act of removing an official by petition
the process of remembering (especially the process of recovering information by mental effort)
example: he has total recall of the episode

tr: a bugle call that signals troops to return
a request by the manufacturer of a defective product to return the product (as for replacement or repair)

example: I can't remember saying any such thing
I can't think what her last name was
can you remember her phone number?
Do you remember that he once loved you?

tr: cause one's (or someone else's) thoughts or attention to return from a reverie or digression
example: She was recalled by a loud laugh
The ambassador was recalled to his country
The company called back many of the workers it had laid off during the recession
This harks back to a previous remark of his
The manufacturer tried to call back the spoilt yoghurt
The company recalled the product when it was found to be faulty
His words echoed John F. Kennedy

value.boxr_value: The verb is pronounced /rɪ'kɔːl/. The noun is pronounced /'riːkɔːl/. 动词读作/rɪ'kɔːl/。名词读作/'riːkɔːl/。

value.def: When you recall something, you remember it and tell others about it.

example.ex: Henderson recalled that he first met Pollard during a business trip to Washington...
example.tran: 亨德森记起他第一次见到波拉德是在一次去华盛顿出差的时候。

example.ex: Her teacher recalled: 'She was always on about modelling.'...
example.tran: 她的老师回忆说：“她那时老是说要当模特。”

example.ex: Colleagues today recall with humor how meetings would crawl into the early morning hours...
example.tran: 同事们现在回忆起会议总是慢吞吞地一直开到第二天凌晨的情景，都把它当作一番笑谈。

example.ex: I recalled the way they had been dancing together...
example.tran: 我回忆起他们一起跳舞时的情景。

example.ex: I have no idea what she said, something about airline travel, I seem to recall.
example.tran: 我记不得她说什么了，好像是坐飞机旅行什么的，如果我没记错的话。

value.def: You can say as I recall ,you might recall, or you will recall to someone that you are talking to when you want to mention something that you are both already aware of which is relevant to the discussion.

example.ex: As I recall, you're not on the board, Joe; you're only a minor shareholder...
example.tran: 我记得你并没有进董事会，乔，你只是一个小股东而已。

example.ex: You will recall that I sent you a warning of troubled times. Well now, almost everything I forecast has come about.
example.tran: 你还记得我警告过你时局会出现动荡吧。现在看来，几乎我预测的每件事都发生了。

value.tran: （用于引出双方都已意识到的事）记得

value.def: Recall is the ability to remember something that has happened in the past or the act of remembering it.

example.ex: He had a good memory, and total recall of her spoken words.
example.tran: 他记忆力很好，她当时说的话他全都记得起来。

value.def: If you are recalled to your home, country, or the place where you work, you are ordered to return there.

example.ex: Spain has recalled its Ambassador after a row over refugees seeking asylum at the embassy...
example.tran: 在对难民到使馆寻求庇护一事产生严重分歧后，西班牙召回了其大使。

example.ex: Parliament was recalled from its summer recess.
example.tran: 国会在夏季休会之后又重新开议。

example.ex: The recall of ambassador Alan Green was a public signal of America's concern.
example.tran: 召回艾伦·格林大使是美国关注此事的一个公开信号。

value.def: In sport, if a player is recalled to a team, he or she is included in that team again after being left out.

example.ex: Dean Richards was recalled to the England squad for the match with Wales...
example.tran: 迪安·理查兹被召回英格兰队参加对阵威尔士的比赛。

example.ex: I had done enough after being recalled against Pakistan to have got on the tour to India.
example.tran: 在被征召入队参加与巴基斯坦的比赛后，我为前往印度的行程做了充分准备。

example.ex: It would be great to get a recall to the England squad for Sweden.
example.tran: 若能够被召进英格兰队参加对瑞典的比赛那就太棒了。

value.def: If a company recalls a product, it asks the shops or the people who have bought that product to return it because there is something wrong with it.

example.ex: The company said it was recalling one of its drugs...
example.tran: 这个公司说正在召回他们生产的一种药。

example.ex: More than 3,000 cars were recalled yesterday because of a brake problem.
example.tran: 3,000多辆汽车因为刹车问题昨天被召回。

value.def: If something is beyond recall, it is no longer possible to remember how it was or to bring it back to its original condition.

example.ex: The ground has been polluted beyond recall...
example.tran: 这片土地已被污染得面目全非。

example.ex: ...the realities of operating a traditional canal boat can be readily imagined, even if the life itself is beyond recall.
example.tran: 经营一艘传统的运河船的现实情形很容易想象，尽管那种生活本身已经无法忆起了。

value.tran: 记不起来；无法忆起；无法恢复原状；面目全非

partsOfSpeech.dec: re 回；向后 + bound 跳跃 → 回弹
re 回；向后 + call 想起 → 回忆
re 回；向后 + claim 要求 → 要求拿回 → 取回
re 回；向后 + flect 弯曲 →〔光线〕向回弯曲 → 反射
re 回；向后 + gress 走 → 倒退
re 回；向后 + juven 年轻 + ate 做，造成，使… → 回到年轻状态 → 返老还童
re 回；向后 + pel 推 → 驱除；击退
re 回；向后 + son 声音 + ant …的 → 回声的 → 回响的
re 回；向后 + tract 拉 → 拉回 → 缩回
re 回；向后 + turn 转动 → 向后转 → 返回
re 相反；反对；不 + action 行动 → 反动；反应
re 相反；反对；不 + bel 战斗 → 反过来打〔自己人〕→ 反叛
re 相反；反对；不 + move 移动 → 往反方向移动 → 移开
re 相反；反对；不 + neg 否认 + ade 表人 → 反过来否认〔自己人〕的人 → 叛徒
re 相反；反对；不 + peal 呼吁 → 不呼吁 → 取消
re 相反；反对；不 + prob 正直 + ate 表人 → 不正直的人 → 堕落者
re 相反；反对；不 + sent 感觉 → 反感 → 不满
re 相反；反对；不 + sist 站 → 反抗，抵抗
re 相反；反对；不 + vers 转 + e → 反转的，颠倒的
re 相反；反对；不 + volt 转 → 反转过来〔对抗自己人〕→ 反叛
re 一再，重新 + appear 出现 → 再出现
re 一再，重新 + arrange 安排 → 重新安排
re 一再，重新 + assure 放心 → 一再让人放心 → 消除（某人）疑虑
re 一再，重新 + birth 出生 → 再生，新生
re 一再，重新 + commend 赞扬 → 一再赞扬 → 推荐
re 一再，重新 + compense 补偿 → 一再补偿 → 赔偿
re 一再，重新 + examination 考试 → 复试
re 一再，重新 + furbish 磨光，擦亮 → 再磨光
re 一再，重新 + gener 产生 + ate 使… → 重新产生〔自我〕→ 改过自新的
re 一再，重新 + number 编号码 → 重新编号
re 一再，重新 + print 出版 → 再版
re 一再，重新 + production 生产 → 再生产
re 一再，重新 + surg 升起 + ence 表行为 → 重新升起 → 复兴
